subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: With remarkable efficiency, the second-seeded Federer beat Richard Gasquet to move into the semifinals, where he will face his Swiss countryman Stan Wawrinka, a victor over Kevin Anderson.
snippet: With remarkable efficiency, the second-seeded Federer beat Richard Gasquet to move into the semifinals, where he will face his Swiss countryman Stan Wawrinka, a victor over Kevin Anderson.
